creditline: Bequest of Mr. and Mrs. Northrop Dawson, Jr.
description: vertical composition; narrow, tall barrel, with worker standing on top, tapping topmost green band with a mallet and a stick; worker at bottom center seen from back, brushing center green band and holding a bucket; green, yellow, and orange; received framed
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
title: Barrel Makers
